Trip hop

Trip hop is a fusion music genre that originated in the UK in the '90s.

AKA
  • Downtempo
Origins 1990s UK
Subgenres

Trip hop pulls from a variety of genres to produce an atmospheric, psychedelic soup of slow-motion sound.
